author: Lauren Vella
title: Anxiety about Brittney Griner's freedom mounts amid Russia-Ukraine conflict  | TheHill
description: Anxiety is mounting over the status of WNBA star Brittney Griner’s freedom after reports surfaced...
content:
Anxiety is mounting over the status of WNBA star Brittney Griners freedom after reports surfaced last week that she had been detained in a Russian airport for possession of hashish oil.
